languages.text: "Да как-то... вышло просто так? Засада была, загрохало вокруг, я отстреливался, отстреливался, потом смотрю — командир с дыркой во лбу лежит, остальные тоже... я жив, а эти — отступили".

"I don't know, I just... did somehow? There was an ambush, everything was going boom and bang around me, and I kept firing back till I saw our commander lying there with a hole in his head, and everybody else, too... I was alive, and the enemy had retreated."
languages.original_text: "Да как-то... вышло просто так? Засада была, загрохало вокруг, я отстреливался, отстреливался, потом смотрю — командир с дыркой во лбу лежит, остальные тоже... я жив, а эти — отступили".

traits.locale_text: "I don't know, I just... did somehow? There was an ambush, everything was going boom and bang around me, and I kept firing back till I saw our commander lying there with a hole in his head, and everybody else, too... I was alive, and they had retreated."

"I don't know, I just... did somehow? There was an ambush, everything was going boom and bang around me, and I kept firing back till I saw our commander lying there with a hole in his head, and everybody else, too... I was alive, and they had retreated."

"I don't know, I just... did somehow? There was an ambush, everything was going boom and bang around me, and I kept firing back till I saw our commander lying there with a hole in his head, and everybody else, too... I was alive, and the enemy had retreated."

languages.text: "Ich weiß es nicht, es ... war einfach so? Es gab einen Hinterhalt, dann war um mich herum nur noch bumm und peng zu hören, und ich habe zurückgefeuert, bis ich unseren Kommandanten da habe liegen sehen, mit einem Loch im Kopf, und alle anderen auch ... Ich war am Leben und der Feind hatte sich zurückgezogen."
languages.original_text: "I don't know, I just... did somehow? There was an ambush, everything was going boom and bang around me, and I kept firing back till I saw our commander lying there with a hole in his head, and everybody else, too... I was alive, and the enemy had retreated."

traits.locale_text: "Ich weiß es nicht, es ... war einfach so? Es gab einen Hinterhalt, dann war um mich herum nur noch bumm und peng zu hören, und ich habe zurückgefeuert, bis ich unseren Kommandanten da habe liegen sehen, mit einem Loch im Kopf, und alle anderen auch ... Ich war am Leben und der Feind hatte sich zurückgezogen."

languages.text: « Je n'en sais rien, j'ai survécu, c'est tout. Il y a eu une embuscade, ça explosait de tous les côtés autour de moi, et j'ai continué à riposter jusqu'à ce que je voie notre commandant étendu avec un trou dans la tête, comme tous les autres... J'étais en vie, et l'ennemi s'était replié. »
languages.original_text: "I don't know, I just... did somehow? There was an ambush, everything was going boom and bang around me, and I kept firing back till I saw our commander lying there with a hole in his head, and everybody else, too... I was alive, and the enemy had retreated."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'en sais rien, j'ai survécu, c'est tout. Il y a eu une embuscade, ça explosait de tous les côtés autour de moi, et j'ai continué à riposter jusqu'à ce que je voie notre commandant étendu avec un trou dans la tête, comme tous les autres... J'étais en vie, et ils s'étaient repliés. »

languages.text: “我不知道，我可能只是……运气好？我们中了埋伏，周围所有的东西都在爆炸。我不停地还击，直到我看到我们的指挥官躺在地上，头上有个洞，其他人也是……我还活着，那些袭击者撤退了。”
languages.original_text: "I don't know, I just... did somehow? There was an ambush, everything was going boom and bang around me, and I kept firing back till I saw our commander lying there with a hole in his head, and everybody else, too... I was alive, and the enemy had retreated."

traits.locale_text: “我不知道，我可能只是……运气好？我们中了埋伏，周围所有的东西都在爆炸。我不停地还击，直到我看到我们的指挥官躺在地上，头上有个洞，其他人也是……我还活着，那些袭击者撤退了。”

languages.text: 「分かりません、ただ…そうなったんです。待ち伏せがあり、私の周りで爆発音が鳴り響き、私はずっと応戦していました。それから私の目の前に頭を撃ち抜かれた指揮官が倒れているのを発見して、そして他のみんなも、それから…私は生きていて、敵は撤退していきました」
languages.original_text: "I don't know, I just... did somehow? There was an ambush, everything was going boom and bang around me, and I kept firing back till I saw our commander lying there with a hole in his head, and everybody else, too... I was alive, and the enemy had retreated."

traits.locale_text: 「分かりません、ただ…そうなったんです。待ち伏せがあり、私の周りで爆発音が鳴り響き、私はずっと応戦していました。それから私の目に頭を撃ち抜かれた指揮官が倒れているのを発見して、そして他のみんなも、それから…私は生きていて、彼らは撤退していきました」

languages.text: «No lo sé, yo solo... ¿lo hice? Hubo una emboscada, todo hacía "bum" y "pam" a mi alrededor, y seguí disparando hasta que vi a nuestro comandante tendido allí con un agujero en la cabeza, y a todos los demás también... Seguía con vida y el enemigo se había retirado».
languages.original_text: "I don't know, I just... did somehow? There was an ambush, everything was going boom and bang around me, and I kept firing back till I saw our commander lying there with a hole in his head, and everybody else, too... I was alive, and the enemy had retreated."

traits.locale_text: «No lo sé, yo solo... ¿lo hice? Hubo una emboscada, todo hacía «bum» y «pam» a mi alrededor, y seguí disparando hasta que vi a nuestro comandante tendido allí con un agujero en la cabeza, y a todos los demás también... Seguía con vida y se habían retirado».

languages.text: "Bilemiyorum, ben... Çıktım işte... Pusuya düştük, etrafımda gümbür gümbür patlama sesleri vardı. Komutanımızı kafasına kurşunu yemiş hâlde görene dek ateş etmeye devam ettim. Diğerleri de ölmüştü... Bense hayattaydım, düşman ricat etmişti."
languages.original_text: "I don't know, I just... did somehow? There was an ambush, everything was going boom and bang around me, and I kept firing back till I saw our commander lying there with a hole in his head, and everybody else, too... I was alive, and the enemy had retreated."

traits.locale_text: "Bilemiyorum, ben... Çıktım işte... Pusuya düştük, etrafımda gümbür gümbür patlama sesleri vardı. Komutanımızı kafasına kurşunu yemiş hâlde görene dek ateş etmeye devam ettim. Diğerleri de ölmüştü... Bense hayattaydım, düşman ricat etmişti."
